entry.title: tarekst/emoji-steg: A lightweight TypeScript library for Unicode steganography in emojis. With this library, text can be hidden in a single emoji, making the encrypted text invisible and only decryptable with the correct password.
entry.content: A lightweight TypeScript library for Unicode steganography in emojis. With this library, text can be hidden in a single emoji, making the encrypted text invisible and only decryptable with the correct password.

entry.title: teberzin/TavernCall: The purpose of TavernCall is to provide a lightweight and thematic online platform for tabletop role-playing game (TTRPG) players to find or create game groups. The website allows users to create temporary "signals" indicating their availability or interest in forming a group. Others can view these signals and reach out via Discord.
entry.content: The purpose of TavernCall is to provide a lightweight and thematic online platform for tabletop role-playing game (TTRPG) players to find or create game groups. The website allows users to create temporary "signals" indicating their availability or interest in forming a group. Others can view these signals and reach out via Discord.

entry.title: theveug/peek: Peek is a lightweight WebRTC-based screen sharing app built with vanilla JS, Node.js, and Tailwind CSS. It lets users share their screen in real-time over a unique session link, with optional stream quality controls.
entry.content: Peek is a lightweight WebRTC-based screen sharing app built with vanilla JS, Node.js, and Tailwind CSS. It lets users share their screen in real-time over a unique session link, with optional stream quality controls.

entry.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
entry.content: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
